message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great deal on this product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm willing to part with it for $11,000.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I'm willing to make a deal, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.
I understand your budget concerns, Bob, but $9,500 is quite a bit lower than what I had in mind. How about we meet in the middle at $10,250?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,800. I'm getting close to my target, but I'd like to save a bit more.
